com.octo.captcha.component.word.worddecorator
Interface WordDecorator

All Known Implementing Classes:
SpellerWordDecorator
public interface WordDecorator

Provide method to decorate a word, that means adding semantic information around the word (like a question) or transforming the word into a semantical set (like a reverese spelling). It hightlight the word for a cognitive entity (human), but hide it form a logical finite engine (computer)

Version:
1.0
Author:
Benoit Doumas

          Function that decorate a word with semantic information.
